overview: Tiago, a young cinephile who loves old movies, goes to the theater with his friend Daniel to watch one of his favourite films: “Rebel Without a Cause”. However, that same evening is the premiere of the newest super-hero movie “Captain Stark Episode VI – The Interplanetary Fall”, which can put Tiago’s plans at stake.
tagline: Tiago just wanted to watch his favorite film at the theater... He just didn't know he wouldn't be the only one!
title: Cinephile With a Cause
